properties.short: Grand 7-Bedroom House in Mattegoda... A masterpiece of architecture blending heritage charm with modern luxury.
properties.description: Grand 5-Bedroom House in Mattegoda... Experience the pinnacle of prestige in this expansive house. Sitting on over 20 perches of prime land, this home marries colonial architectural aesthetics with cutting-edge smart home technology. The grand entrance leads to a double-height foyer, flowing into a formal living room adorned with teak timber flooring and antique-style fittings. The master wing occupies the entire upper west side, featuring a private balcony and a jacuzzi-equipped en-suite. The landscaped garden includes a solar-heated plunge pool and a barbecue pavilion, making it perfect for high-end social gatherings. Located just minutes from the highway entrance, this property offers seclusion without compromising commute times. Price: $185 Million – A masterpiece of architecture blending heritage charm with modern luxury.

properties.short: Coastal Luxury Flat... Wake up to the sound of the ocean in this premium beachfront residence.
properties.description: Coastal Luxury Flat... Embrace the coastal lifestyle in this stunning 3-bedroom flat designed to maximize ocean vistas. Unlike typical apartments, this unit features a wrap-around balcony that offers panoramic views of the southern coastline. The interior design utilizes a palette of soft whites and ocean blues, creating a serene, resort-like atmosphere. The kitchen is fully open-plan with quartz countertops and imported fittings, seamlessly connecting to the dining area for sunset dinner parties. Residents enjoy exclusive access to a rooftop infinity pool and a private gym. Situated in the heart of the tourist district yet tucked away for privacy, this is an ideal vacation home or high-yield rental investment. Price: $65 Million – Wake up to the sound of the ocean in this premium beachfront residence.

properties.short: Contemporary Family House... A geometrically inspired home offering functional luxury near the city limits.
properties.description: Contemporary Family House... This architecturally unique 4-bedroom house stands out with its clean lines and geometric facade. Built on a spacious 12-perch block, it prioritizes natural ventilation with a central courtyard that acts as the heart of the home. The ground floor features a dedicated home office and a guest suite, while the upper floor houses the family bedrooms, ensuring privacy. The rooftop terrace is fully tiled and reinforced, ready for a roof garden or solar panel installation. Located in a rapidly developing area, you are walking distance from historical landmarks and top-tier schools. This property is a perfect match for a growing family looking for a forever home. Price: $42 Million – A geometrically inspired home offering functional luxury near the city limits.

properties.short: Minimalist Urban Flat... The ultimate starter home for the busy professional.
properties.description: Minimalist Urban Flat... Efficiency meets style in this cleverly designed 2-bedroom flat. Though compact, the use of mirrored walls and multi-functional furniture makes the space feel surprisingly airy. The unit comes fully furnished with a curated selection of modern decor, meaning you can move in with just a suitcase. The main bedroom is separated by a sliding glass partition to maintain an open flow during the day. Residents benefit from a co-working space in the lobby and a 24-hour concierge service. Located in a tech-hub suburb, this property promises high rental demand and convenience. Price: $28 Million – The ultimate starter home for the busy professional.

properties.short: Nature-Inspired Suburban House... A tranquil retreat featuring eco-friendly design and lush surroundings.
properties.description: Nature-Inspired Suburban House... Escape the city hustle in this sprawling 4-bedroom house designed to coexist with nature. The property features large glass walls that blur the line between the indoors and the manicured tropical gardens surrounding the house. Sustainability is key here, with rainwater harvesting systems and solar power integration already in place. The kitchen is rustic yet modern, featuring mahogany fittings and a clay-tile finish. All four bedrooms open directly onto the garden, providing a resort-like waking experience every morning. Located near the expressway interchange, travel to the capital is effortless. Price: $75 Million – A tranquil retreat featuring eco-friendly design and lush surroundings.

properties.short: Skyline View Flat... Unparalleled views of the city skyline from the privacy of your own terrace.
properties.description: Skyline View Flat... Elevate your lifestyle in this luxurious 3-bedroom flat. Occupying a high floor, this unit offers privacy and silence rarely found in the city. The highlight is the private terrace, perfect for hosting cocktail parties against the backdrop of the city lights. Inside, the living area features Italian marble flooring and a chandelier-ready high ceiling. The master bath includes a soaking tub with a view. Located in a prestigious residential zone, you are minutes away from international schools and high-end hospitals. Price: $35 Million – Unparalleled views of the city skyline from the privacy of your own terrace.

properties.short: Palatial House by the Lagoon... A massive 6-bedroom estate offering privacy, security, and grandeur.
properties.description: Palatial House by the Lagoon... This is not just a house; it is a legacy property. Spanning a massive 34 perches, this 6-bedroom house is designed for a large extended family or a boutique hotel conversion. The property features a grand dual-staircase entrance, a private library, a cinema room, and separate staff quarters. The grounds are expansive enough to accommodate a tennis court or additional structures. Located near the lagoon, the air is fresh and cool year-round. With proximity to the international airport, it is also perfect for frequent flyers or expats. Price: $120 Million – A massive 6-bedroom estate offering privacy, security, and grandeur.

properties.short: Cozy Seaside Flat... Affordable luxury with easy access to Marine Drive and the beach.
properties.description: Cozy Seaside Flat... Enjoy the sea breeze daily in this charming 3-bedroom flat. This unit has been recently renovated to include modern timber-finish tiling and a modular kitchen setup. It is the perfect entry-level property for a young family looking to live in the city. The building offers a rooftop drying yard and dedicated motorcycle parking. The location is unbeatable, with supermarkets, cafes, and the beach just a short walk away. Low maintenance fees and high rental potential make this a smart investment choice. Price: $32 Million – Affordable luxury with easy access to Marine Drive and the beach.

properties.short: Hill Country Style House... A scenic home surrounded by greenery, perfect for a peaceful retirement.
properties.description: Hill Country Style House... Nestled in the cool climes, this 4-bedroom house offers a life of tranquility. The architecture mimics the colonial hill-station style with stone cladding and a pitched roof. The garden is a botanist's dream, filled with fruit trees and flowering plants. Inside, a working fireplace adds character to the cozy living room. The property is situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, ensuring zero traffic noise, yet remains close to the university and botanical gardens. It is an idyllic setting for retirement or a holiday home away from the heat. Price: $25 Million – A scenic home surrounded by greenery, perfect for a peaceful retirement.
